posterPrompts: Modern, clean design featuring your business logo prominently displayed against a gradient background from deep purple to bright blue. Include customer testimonials in elegant typography with subtle geometric patterns and professional lighting that conveys trust and innovation.

Dynamic composition showing diverse, happy customers engaging with your brand in a contemporary setting. Warm, inviting colors with your brand elements seamlessly integrated. Include call-to-action text in bold, readable fonts with premium visual hierarchy.
data.videoScript:
FADE IN: Modern office space with natural lighting

VOICEOVER: 'Every great business starts with a vision...'

CUT TO: Montage of diverse team members collaborating

VOICEOVER: 'At [Your Business], we turn that vision into reality.'

CUT TO: Happy customers using your product/service

VOICEOVER: 'Join thousands who've already transformed their success story.'

TEXT OVERLAY: 'Your Business Name - Where Vision Meets Reality'

CALL TO ACTION: 'Get Started Today'

FADE OUT
